s0251: Then proceeded north to tour Shuofang, mustered over 100,000 troops, returned to sacrifice at Huangdi's tomb at Qiaoshan, reviewed troops at Xubian.
s0252: The emperor said: 'I heard Huangdi did not die, now has a tomb, why?'
s0253: Someone replied: 'Huangdi already became immortal and ascended to heaven, his ministers buried his clothes and hat.'
s0254: Then arrived at Ganquan, for about to perform ceremonies at Mount Tai, first offered lei sacrifice to Taiyi.
s0255: Since obtaining the precious tripod, the emperor with nobles and scholars discussed feng and shan.
s0256: Feng and shan use rare and distant precedents, no one knows the ceremony and rites, the Confucian scholars collected feng and shan from the Shangshu, Zhouguan, Wangzhi's wang sacrifices and shooting oxen matters.
s0257: The Qi man Ding Gong, over ninety years old, said: 'Feng means uniting the name of immortality.
s0258: Qin emperor could not ascend for feng.
s0259: Your Majesty must ascend, gradually ascend and there will be no wind or rain, then ascend for feng.'
s0260: The emperor then ordered the Confucian scholars to practice shooting oxen, draft feng and shan ceremonies.
s0261: Several years, until about to proceed.
s0262: The officials said: 'The feng and shan ceremonies are the greatest, the Son of Heaven's most important affair.'
s0263: The emperor said: 'Touring the east, I passed through Lu, heard the qilü music, wished to change the music.'
s0264: The prime minister and others said: 'The qilü is the standard of the former kings, cannot change.'
s0265: The emperor said: 'I do not follow the former kings' ways.'
s0266: Then changed the qilü to be suitable for the new music.
s0268: Second year, the emperor toured Yizhou.
s0269: Third year, the emperor toured Yanzhou.
s0270: Fourth year, the emperor toured Jingzhou.
s0271: Fifth year, the emperor toured Yangzhou.
s0272: Sixth year, the emperor toured Qingzhou.
s0273: Seventh year, the emperor toured Xuzhou.
s0274: Eighth year, the emperor toured Youzhou.

s0277: Eleventh year, the emperor toured Liangzhou.
s0278: Twelfth year, the emperor toured Yongzhou.
s0279: Thirteenth year, the emperor toured Yizhou.
s0280: Fourteenth year, the emperor toured Yanzhou.
s0281: Fifteenth year, the emperor toured Jingzhou.
s0282: Sixteenth year, the emperor toured Yangzhou.
s0283: Seventeenth year, the emperor toured Qingzhou.
s0284: Eighteenth year, the emperor toured Xuzhou.
s0285: Nineteenth year, the emperor toured Youzhou.
s0286: Twentieth year, the emperor toured Bingzhou.
s0287: Twenty-first year, the emperor toured Jizhou.
s0288: Twenty-second year, the emperor toured Liangzhou.
s0289: Twenty-third year, the emperor toured Yongzhou.
s0290: Twenty-fourth year, the emperor toured Yizhou.
s0291: Twenty-fifth year, the emperor toured Yanzhou.
s0292: Twenty-sixth year, the emperor toured Jingzhou.
s0293: Twenty-seventh year, the emperor toured Yangzhou.
s0294: Twenty-eighth year, the emperor toured Qingzhou.
s0295: Twenty-ninth year, the emperor toured Xuzhou.
s0296: Thirtieth year, the emperor toured Youzhou.
s0297: Thirty-first year, the emperor toured Bingzhou.
s0298: Thirty-second year, the emperor toured Jizhou.
s0299: Thirty-third year, the emperor toured Liangzhou.
s0300: Thirty-fourth year, the emperor toured Yongzhou.
